content: Every sunrise brings a fresh dose of power and ideas to tackle the day, so seize it with gusto.
Challenge yourself daily by doing something that makes your heart race faster than a squirrel on caffeine.
Don't overanalyze, or you might just miss your chance to seize the day.
Challenge yourself daily by doing something that makes your heart race faster than a squirrel on caffeine.
Don't quit when you're on the brink of success; the next hurdle might be the final boss level.
